---
title: "A test notebook with Shinylive"
---

``` {r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```



``` {r}
a<- c(1:10)
b<- a * 2 + 1


df<- data.frame(a, b)

fp<- paste0(here(),"/shiny_apps/app1/data.csv")

write.csv(df, fp)

```
